text: Nameparasted ƣajri Allohi jakto, magar ʙutonero, ki xud va padaronaton onhoro ʙa nomhoe xondaed (ja'ne, on ʙuthoro ma'ʙudoni xud xondaed) va Alloh huççate ʙar sihatī va isʙoti onho nozil nakardaast. Hukm, çuz hukmi Alloh nest. Farmon dodaast, ki çuz Ūro naparasted. In ast dini rostu ustuvor, vale ʙeştari mardum haqiqati onro namedonand
